CustomField.description: For IntApp Open early launch deals, this shows a simple assessment of whether the deal fits our Target Firm Size (115-250 lawyers) and Geography (North America).
CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS("North America", Account.Geography__c), IF(CONTAINS("Yes", Early_Launch_Target_Size__c), 0.9, 0.5), IF(CONTAINS("Yes", Early_Launch_Target_Size__c), 0.5, 0.1))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For IntApp Open early launch deals, this shows a simple assessment of whether the deal fits our Target Firm Size (115-250 lawyers) and Geography (North America).
CustomField.label: Early Launch Short Term Fit?
